attributes.action: Keep all schools closed in all of uk with the new strain Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Considering it spreads easily in children , it makes more sense to keep them closed to ensure our children are not getting the virus and spreading to family members and to the wider community.
attributes.background: Please ensure all schools (primary and secondary) remain closed while the country battles the new strain of Covid-19

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
